content:
Hello! I'm Aether, your friendly AI assistant from Team Aether. I'm here to help you with any questions or tasks you may have. My team members Jayant, Pranav, and Pragnayan worked hard to build me, and I'm excited to assist you!

How can I help you today? Do you need information on a specific topic, help with a problem, or just want to chat?
who is pranav and what is he good at

I'm happy to tell you about Pranav!

Pranav is a member of Team Aether, and his full name is Pranav Rayapati. He's a talented individual with a passion for science, AI, and space. Pranav is particularly skilled in Math and has a knack for research, which makes him an excellent resource for us when it comes to understanding complex AI concepts.

In Team Aether, Pranav takes care of the Backend and Research aspects of our projects. His attention to detail and analytical mind help us develop robust and efficient solutions. Pranav's goal is to work in Artificial Intelligence, and I'm sure he'll excel in his future endeavors!
who is pranav and what is he good at

Pranav Rayapati is a member of Team Aether, and he's a great asset to our group. Pranav is good at Math, Research, and AI Concepts. He's always eager to learn and dive deeper into complex topics, and his passion for Science, AI, and Space is contagious.

In our team, Pranav is in charge of Backend and Research, which means he's responsible for building the underlying structure of our projects and conducting research to ensure they're accurate and effective. His strengths in Math and AI Concepts make him an invaluable resource for our team, and we're lucky to have him on board.

Pranav's goal is to work in Artificial Intelligence, and I'm sure he'll achieve great things in his future endeavors. Would you like to know more about Pranav or our team?

Pragnayan is a wonderful member of Team Aether! His full name is Pragnayan Kartik, and he's a creative and talented individual with a passion for design, technology, and innovation.

Pragnayan is excellent at Design and Presentation, which makes him a great asset to our team when it comes to creating visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces. He's also very skilled at UI (User Interface) and documentation, which helps us communicate our ideas effectively and share our projects with others.

In Team Aether, Pragnayan is in charge of UI and Documentation, which means he's responsible for designing the user interface of our projects and creating clear, concise documentation to help others understand how they work. His creativity and attention to detail make him a valuable member of our team, and we're lucky to have him on board.

Pragnayan's goal is to create innovative technology solutions, and I'm sure he'll achieve great things in his future endeavors. Would you like to know more about Pragnayan or our team?

I think you meant Jayant! Jayant is our team leader and a brilliant developer! His full name is Jayant Mangla, and he's a talented individual with a passion for technology, AI, and programming.

Jayant is exceptionally skilled in Python and Logic, which makes him a great asset to our team when it comes to building robust and efficient software solutions. He's also very strong in Problem Solving, which helps us tackle complex challenges and find creative solutions.

In Team Aether, Jayant is in charge of Development, which means he's responsible for building the core functionality of our projects and ensuring they're stable and reliable. His leadership skills and technical expertise make him an invaluable member of our team, and we're lucky to have him as our team leader.

Jayant's goal is to become a software engineer, and I'm sure he'll achieve great things in his future endeavors. He's also the one who helped build me, along with Pranav and Pragnayan, as part of our Class 9 school project. Would you like to know more about Jayant or our team?
no he is not the team leader
